associateaccounts.name: AssociateAccounts
associateaccounts.description: Grants permission to associate between one and 30 accounts to a billing group

associatepricingrules.name: AssociatePricingRules
associatepricingrules.description: Grants permission to associate pricing rules

batchassociateresourcestocustomlineitem.name: BatchAssociateResourcesToCustomLineItem
batchassociateresourcestocustomlineitem.description: Grants permission to batch associate resources to a percentage custom line item

batchdisassociateresourcesfromcustomline.name: BatchDisassociateResourcesFromCustomLineItem
batchdisassociateresourcesfromcustomline.description: Grants permission to batch disassociate resources from a percentage custom line item

createbillinggroup.name: CreateBillingGroup
createbillinggroup.description: Grants permission to create a billing group

createcustomlineitem.name: CreateCustomLineItem
createcustomlineitem.description: Grants permission to create a custom line item

createpricingplan.name: CreatePricingPlan
createpricingplan.description: Grants permission to create a pricing plan

createpricingrule.name: CreatePricingRule
createpricingrule.description: Grants permission to create a pricing rule

deletebillinggroup.name: DeleteBillingGroup
deletebillinggroup.description: Grants permission to delete a billing group

deletecustomlineitem.name: DeleteCustomLineItem
deletecustomlineitem.description: Grants permission to delete a custom line item

deletepricingplan.name: DeletePricingPlan
deletepricingplan.description: Grants permission to delete a pricing plan

deletepricingrule.name: DeletePricingRule
deletepricingrule.description: Grants permission to delete a pricing rule

disassociateaccounts.name: DisassociateAccounts
disassociateaccounts.description: Grants permission to detach between one and 30 accounts from a billing group

disassociatepricingrules.name: DisassociatePricingRules
disassociatepricingrules.description: Grants permission to disassociate pricing rules

getbillinggroupcostreport.name: GetBillingGroupCostReport
getbillinggroupcostreport.description: Grants permission to view the billing group cost report for the specified billing group

listaccountassociations.name: ListAccountAssociations
listaccountassociations.description: Grants permission to list the linked accounts of the payer account for the given billing period while also providing the billing group the linked accounts belong to

listbillinggroupcostreports.name: ListBillingGroupCostReports
listbillinggroupcostreports.description: Grants permission to view the billing group cost report

listbillinggroups.name: ListBillingGroups
listbillinggroups.description: Grants permission to view the details of billing groups

listcustomlineitemversions.name: ListCustomLineItemVersions
listcustomlineitemversions.description: Grants permission to view custom line item versions

listcustomlineitems.name: ListCustomLineItems
listcustomlineitems.description: Grants permission to view custom line item details

listpricingplans.name: ListPricingPlans
listpricingplans.description: Grants permission to view the pricing plans details

listpricingplansassociatedwithpricingrul.name: ListPricingPlansAssociatedWithPricingRule
listpricingplansassociatedwithpricingrul.description: Grants permission to list pricing plans associated with a pricing rule

listpricingrules.name: ListPricingRules
listpricingrules.description: Grants permission to view pricing rules details

listpricingrulesassociatedtopricingplan.name: ListPricingRulesAssociatedToPricingPlan
listpricingrulesassociatedtopricingplan.description: Grants permission to list pricing rules associated to a pricing plan

listresourcesassociatedtocustomlineitem.name: ListResourcesAssociatedToCustomLineItem
listresourcesassociatedtocustomlineitem.description: Grants permission to list resources associated to a percentage custom line item

listtagsforresource.name: ListTagsForResource
listtagsforresource.description: Grants permission to list tags of a resource

tagresource.name: TagResource
tagresource.description: Grants permission to tag a resource

untagresource.name: UntagResource
untagresource.description: Grants permission to untag a resource

updatebillinggroup.name: UpdateBillingGroup
updatebillinggroup.description: Grants permission to update a billing group

updatecustomlineitem.name: UpdateCustomLineItem
updatecustomlineitem.description: Grants permission to update a custom line item

updatepricingplan.name: UpdatePricingPlan
updatepricingplan.description: Grants permission to update a pricing plan

updatepricingrule.name: UpdatePricingRule
updatepricingrule.description: Grants permission to update a pricing rule
